trans-unit.source: Represents the container that handles the layout of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 表示处理的布局的容器<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A ToolBarTray is responsible for handling placement, sizing, drag-and-drop operations, and rearranging of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> controls.
trans-unit.target: ToolBarTray 负责处理放置、 大小调整，拖放操作和重新排列的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>

trans-unit.source: ToolBarTray controls are also responsible for managing the rows (or "bands") in which <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> controls appear.
trans-unit.target: ToolBarTray 控件也要负责管理的行 （或"带区"），在其中<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>控件显示。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>

trans-unit.source: A ToolBarTray may be horizontal or vertical and, like a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, is often docked at the top of an application window.
trans-unit.target: ToolBarTray 可能水平或垂直和喜欢<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>，通常停靠在应用程序窗口的顶部。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Called to arrange and size its <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar"></xref> children.
trans-unit.target: 调用以排列和调整大小其<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar"></xref>子级。

trans-unit.source: The size that the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray"></xref> assumes to position its children.
trans-unit.target: 大小的<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray"></xref>假定用于定位其子级。

trans-unit.source: The size of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控件的大小。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a brush to use for the background color of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要用于的背景色画笔<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A brush to use for the background color of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 要用于的背景色画笔<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray.Background*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray.Background*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray.Background*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Reads the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray.IsLocked*> property from the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 读取值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray.IsLocked*>从指定的元素的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray.IsLocked*>

trans-unit.source: The element from which to read the property.
trans-unit.target: 从中读取属性元素。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the toolbar cannot be moved inside the toolbar tray; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果不能在工具栏托盘中; 内移动工具栏否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the index number of the visible child.
trans-unit.target: 获取可见的子级的索引号。

trans-unit.source: Index of the visual child.
trans-unit.target: 可视子的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index number of the visible child.
trans-unit.target: 可见的子级的索引号。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar"></xref> can be moved inside a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar"></xref>可以内移动<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This dependency property also has an attached property usage.
trans-unit.target: 此依赖项属性还具有附加的属性的用法。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the toolbar cannot be moved inside the toolbar tray; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果不能在工具栏托盘中; 内移动工具栏否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.target: 获取一个枚举器的逻辑子元素到<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 枚举的子级<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray"></xref>元素。

trans-unit.source: Called to remeasure a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 调用以 remeasure <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The measurement constraints; a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray"></xref> cannot return a size larger than the constraint.
trans-unit.target: 测量约束;<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray"> </xref>无法返回大小大于该约束。

trans-unit.source: The size of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控件的大小。

trans-unit.source: Called when a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray"></xref> is displayed to get the Drawing Context (DC) to use to render the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 时调用<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray"></xref>会显示，以获取绘图上下文 (DC) 用于将呈现<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Drawing context to use to render the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 绘制上下文，用于将呈现<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the orientation of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指定的方向<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Orientation"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Orientation"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Orientation"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray.Orientation*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray.Orientation*>

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.target: 值写入<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray.IsLocked*>到指定的元素的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray.IsLocked*>

trans-unit.source: The element to write the property to.
trans-unit.target: 要写入的属性的元素。

trans-unit.source: The property value to set.
trans-unit.target: 要设置的属性值。

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此类型或成员支持[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]基础结构，不应在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: An object to add as a child.
trans-unit.target: 要作为子级添加的对象。

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此类型或成员支持[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]基础结构，不应在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: A string to add to the object.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到对象的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar"></xref> elements in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取的集合<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar"></xref>中的元素<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: You can add <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> objects to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray> by using XAML, but do not use object element syntax.
trans-unit.target: 你可以添加<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>对象添加到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray>通过使用 XAML，但不是使用对象元素语法。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>

trans-unit.source: That is, do not explicitly specify the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> object.
trans-unit.target: 也就是说，不显式指定<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601>对象。</xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601>

trans-unit.source: XAML does not support declaring generic types.
trans-unit.target: XAML 不支持声明泛型类型。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *OneOrMoreToolBarElements* One or more objects.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 属性元素用法``` ``` # # XAML 值*OneOrMoreToolBarElements*一个或多个对象。

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 集合<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of children that are currently visible.
trans-unit.target: 获取的当前可见的子级的个数。

trans-unit.source: The number of visible <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 可见数<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar"></xref>中的对象<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray"> </xref>。
